name: PixlCross
overview: 150+ nonograms on the Wii U GamePad. Robust Puzzle Editor & community sharing. Extensive Miiverse integration. PixlCross is a nonogram puzzle game (eg Picross) where you use hints to fill in a grid and reveal a hidden image. With 150+ puzzles and 4 levels of difficulty, there's a diverse array of content with puzzles spanning from 5x5 to 35x35.
